rows.label: tev001301_MSG0001
rows.name:
I am so grateful for all that BLADE has done,
including furnishing me with this splendid home.
I am not worthy of such largesse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am still searching for a purpose that I might serve
in this fair city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I pray that you will give me the opportunity to
repay my debt to BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1001
rows.name:
While I confess I have not yet been able to fully
conquer my fear of combat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1002
rows.name:
I am proud to report that I am now officially a
BLADE operative! So perhaps you would like to take
me along with you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Celica to your team.

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Celica's request for now.

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1003
rows.name:
I shall do everything in my power to assist you.
But failing that, I shall at least stay out of your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1004
rows.name:
I am determined to serve New LA as a BLADE
operative, so please do not hesitate to put me to use.
I am ever at your call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1009
rows.name:
I heard that humanity cannot survive without this
Lifehold Core that you seek.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1010
rows.name:
I do not know if I would be of any help to you in
finding it, but I am completely at your disposal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1011
rows.name:
Humanity has provided Rock and I with a place to
belong. Please give me a chance to repay that debt.
Let me come with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Celica to your team.

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Celica's request for now.

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1012
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
I am yours to command.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1013
rows.name:
I assure you that I can fight when necessary.
Should you ever find yourself shorthanded,
please allow me to assist you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1018
rows.name:
I expect that an attack on the Ganglion's central
command will put us face-to-face with enemies
far stronger than any we have yet encountered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1019
rows.name:
I have trepidations about that, as I am certain do you.
But if you wish to take me along, know that I will
prepare myself to the utmost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Celica to your team.

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Celica's request for now.

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1020
rows.name:
I would like to say that I am trembling with excitement,
but I must admit it is fear. Nevertheless, I have the
utmost confidence in our success with you in command.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1021
rows.name:
I have the utmost confidence in your success.
But please do be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1026
rows.name:
Humanity has bestowed two precious treasures upon
Rock and I: friends and a place to belong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1027
rows.name:
And the two of us are agreed that we have a duty to
help protect humanity's most priceless treasure in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1028
rows.name:
Please allow me to assist you in your mission to secure
the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Celica to your team.

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Celica's request for now.

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1029
rows.name:
As a friend and fellow BLADE operative, I will serve
you loyally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1030
rows.name:
Then Rock and I shall remain here and await news
of your successful return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1035
rows.name: Recently, I purchased Rock a large hammock from L.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1036
rows.name:
But this morning, while still groggy from the night's rest,
he tumbled out of it. It was quite amusing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1037
rows.name:
Ah, but listen to me prattle on. If there is anything that
I can do to assist you, you need but to ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Celica to your team.

rows.label: tev001301_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001301_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Celica's request for now.

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1038
rows.name:
And what mission awaits us this fine day?
Whatever the task, I will not let you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001301_MSG1039
rows.name: Then I shall spend another leisurely day with Rock.[ST:wait ]
